scripts.deploy: npm run version:stable && clasp deploy --description "Production deployment $(date)" && npm run webapp:url
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy && npm run trigger:install
scripts.deploy:webapp: npm run push && echo "\nðŸš€ Deploying web app...\n" && clasp deploy --description "Web app deployment $(date)" && npm run webapp:url
scripts.webapp:url: echo "\nðŸ“± Getting web app URL...\n" && clasp run getWebAppUrl
